name: ZeusAiTrading
description: To address the challenges in leveraged trading, we have developed Zeus Ai Trading ($ZAT), a cutting-edge trading system powered by advanced AI technology. Our system has been rigorously tested through back testing using various datasets, including Bitcoincharts, historical data, dukascopy, Darwinex, Alpari Pro ECN/Standard, and Tick Data Suite for 99% modeling accuracy. Back tests were conducted for one year in both past and forward test modes, showing promising results. The maximum drawdown was 10% of the total equity The $ZAT system leverages AI algorithms to analyze historical and real-time market data, optimize trading strategies, and manage risk effectively. Our team of cypherpunk enthusiasts and visionaries with years of experience in blockchain and trading have developed a sophisticated system that incorporates technical indicators, machine learning, and data-driven decision making to identify profitable trading opportunities.
